name: The World is Binary: Why Love is the Answer
description: The World is Binary, a 3D visual novel, takes you on a journey of good and evil, science and religion, and questions what is true or false. The experience explores the ideas of love and fear, and offers practical steps on how you can improve your life and change the world.

name: Gear.Club Stradale
description: Gear Club Stradale is a dream come true: you take a long vacation in a gorgeous villa with all the time you want to drive the most beautiful cars.

name: Hundred Bullets
description: Sin descripción

name: Ghostwire: Tokyo - Prelude: The Corrupted Casefile
description: Join KK and his gang of supernatural detectives as they investigate a strange disappearance, only to stumble upon something more sinister. A visual novel prequel to Ghostwire: Tokyo.

name: Demetrios: The BIG Cynical Adventure Replastered
description:
Demetrios is a quirky point and click adventure game inspired by classics like Broken Sword, packed with tons of humor, now in 4k!

Bjorn Thonen, a slob of an antique dealer living in Paris, is robbed one night after coming home drunk. Forced to conduct his own investigation with the help of his neighbor Sandra, he ends up involved in a murky, mysterious affair. Will these unlikely heroes be able to rise up and discover ancient secrets?

The game offers situations and puzzles for beginners and experts alike, with a high degree of interactivity. Explore ridiculous item combinations, just to see what happens!

name: Dead Against Us
description: Dead Against Us is a top-down shooter, zombie-survival game where you scavenge the map for a way out.

name: The New Chronicles of Noah's Ark
description: Help Noah in this Match3 game to build a great ark capable of housing two of each kind of animal, in order to save them and bring them safely through the flood. It will be a tremendous task, one that sounds impossible to complete.

name: It'sRoachTime!
description: It'sRoachTime! - is a hardcore, third person 3D online pvp fighting arena game! Fight as a mutant cockroach in real time insect simulator, find your way to survive, destroy them all!

name: Dr. Professor Scientist's Weapons Testing Facility
description: DPSWTF is a casual tower defense game with roguelike elements, where instead of placing towers, you build the best tower of them all. Combine the best projectiles with effective modifiers and push back the incoming hordes. Research them all to conquer the secrets of the Great North!

name: Maze of Realities: Flower of Discord - Collector's Edition
description: Several mysterious worlds remained unexplored to humans until a detective took up a new investigation into the disappearance of a group of explorers in Greenland.

name: Man of Sterling Quality
description: Son: Father, what is the nature of masculinity? Father: That is a most excellent question my son. Most worthy of contemplation.

name: Frog Fall Down
description: Frog has fallen into a sinkhole, and only you can help him out of the pit while dealing with some of the most janky and unfair physics you'll ever see in a precision platformer.

name: Second World
description: In Second World, you have to take on the role of a little demon who needs to get out of the lost world and return home. On a way you will meet a lot of deadly traps and monsters that will do anything for you to stay in this strange and at the same time frightening world.

name: Ancient Medieval Empire
description: Ancient Medieval Empire is a strategy game with RPG elements. A huge number of free castles and villages, which greatly attract the evil orcs. Manage your army, capture new castles and fight back against enemies. You have to capture as many castles as possible and drive away the orcs.

name: Hidden Build Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Robert: Space Stories and Battles
description: Space shootouts and fascinating stories.

name: Phobies
description: Phobies is a tactical card collecting strategy game where players battle one another in the surreal realm of the subconscious, where fears manifest. Use devious tactics and unleash a dazzling array of attacks and abilities to achieve victory!

name: A Flicker of Light
description: A catastrophe swept across the world. By an accident, my family and I were caught in a whirlpool of crime. How should I struggle to get out and save everything I cherish... or carry up all the sins I've done and keep going?

name: WWE 2K22: NWO 4 - Life Edition
description:
WWE 2K returns with all the features you can handle in WWE 2K22, the twenty-sixth professional wrestling game in the WWE game franchise and the ninth game in the WWE 2K series! Get ripped out of the stands and hit with complete control of the WWE Universe. Throw down with the biggest and most realistic-looking WWE Superstars and Legends. Relive pivotal moments in Rey Mysterio's iconic career in 2K Showcase. Hitting this hard has never been so easy!

WWE 2K22: NWO 4 - Life Edition includes:
- Undertaker Immortal Pack (3 additional Undertaker characters, MyFACTION EVO cards for Undertaker, MyFACTION Perks and Bonuses)
- Season Pass (includes all five DLC content packs, MyCAREER Mega-Boost, SuperCharger packs)
- MyFACTION EVO Cards and playable nWO versions of "Hollywood: Hulk Hogan, Scott Hall, Kevin Nash, and Syxx
- Eric Bischoff's playable character, including his MyFACTION EVO Card
- Souled Out 1997 and Bash at the Beach 1996 arenas
- The nWo Wolfpac Championship
- 1 MyFACTION "Gold" Pack bundled with nWo EVO cards

name: WWE 2K22: Deluxe Edition
description:
WWE 2K returns with all the features you can handle in WWE 2K22, the twenty-sixth professional wrestling game in the WWE game franchise and the ninth game in the WWE 2K series! Get ripped out of the stands and hit with complete control of the WWE Universe. Throw down with the biggest and most realistic-looking WWE Superstars and Legends. Relive pivotal moments in Rey Mysterio's iconic career in 2K Showcase. Hitting this hard has never been so easy!

WWE 2K22: Deluxe Edition includes:
- WWE 2K22 Standard Edition
- Undertaker Immortal Pack
- Three days of Early Access
- Season Pass (includes all five DLC content packs)
- Starrcade '96 Mysterio Pack

name: Phaseshift
description: Brace yourself for a face-peeling blast through cyberpunk styled locales. Engage in frantic vehicular combat with over 17 highly explosive abilities and weapons. Inspired by 90s/00s combat racers.

name: Offroad Truck Racing
description: Offroad Truck Racing - innovation rally simulator about truck racing in different places. There you can buy your first truck and tuning it. After you can participate in international racing festivals in snow mountains, deserts, meadows and jungles.

name: Runout
description: The RunOut is a dynamic runner-platformer with logical puzzles. The main setting is the future. The game difficulty is between midcore and hardcore.

name: On Key Up: A Game for Keyboards
description: Get to know your keyboard with this unique, physics-based puzzle game!

name: The Mystic
description: The Mystic is a dark fantasy, turn-based strategy game. Become a follower of the first gods, gain their favour, overthrow the High King by innovative combat and magic systems and establish harmony. The game offers an exciting campaign full of twists, battles and difficult decisions and multiplayer.

name: Urban Mage
description: Play as a raging mage in a modern environment and catch all the citizens before the cops arrive and arrest you. Or kill the cops as well. Destroy the town. Don't forget to look inside the houses. Find everyone. Jump on roofs, dash through the streets and use all your powers.

name: Brawl Stars: Biodome
description: Sin descripción

name: Women's School Simulator 2022
description: A school simulator game that reproduces a girls' school with cherry blossoms(sakura) on a small island like an anime.

name: HewDraw Remix
description: HewDraw Remix is a comprehensive overhaul of Super Smash Bros. Ultimate, inspired by the fast and technical gameplay of previous titles like Super Smash Bros. Melee and Project M. The mod offers unique changes to character movesets and core mechanics, and makes changes to UI and control options to provide more competitive depth and accessibility.

name: Perfect Ball
description:
You go on a long journey as a ball. All you have to do is get to the top.

You can't move alone. Because you're a ball without arms or legs. However, even if you can't move on your own, it's possible to move the ground you're standing on. Rotate and tilt the ground so that you can climb up!

Of course, it will not be an easy journey. You can't stop or jump up wherever you want. Also, all kinds of obstacles will interfere with you.

However, don't give up and go up. It doesn't matter how many times you fail. Even if it takes a lot of time, put all your strength into it, tilt the ground, and reach the top along with the tilted land.

The top of the lonely world will wait for you forever.

name: Axolotl Stars
description:
The axolotls came out of the water to play. Be an axolotl and join the endless fun.
Race other axolotls and avoid an abundance of hazardous obstacles to become the axolotl star. Run through the chaotic levels and reach the finish line first.

name: Tradle
description: A daily geography guessing game, where players are initially given data about a country's exports to assist in guessing the correct country.

name: Guncho
description:
Guncho is a single player turn based tactical wild west shooter-roguelike. Engage in a unique positional shooting mechanic and fight your way through a series of randomly generated levels. Ride your donkey and use a variety of skills and bullet upgrades to become the ultimate gun slinger.

In this single-player tactical Wild West shooter-roguelike, you play as Guncho against a variety of bandits and outlaws. In a series of randomly generated levels, you use your trusty revolver to fight your way through each encounter. At the end of every run, you will face a final boss which you need to defeat in order to become the ultimate gun slinger.

name: Murdle
description: A daily deduction game designed to test logical thinking and reasoning abilities.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 9
description: A Sensational Vacation Helping to Run TWO National Parks Spend a sensational Summer helping the Rangers run Pinecreek Hills & Buffalo Valley National Parks.

name: Mystery Solitaire: Powerful Alchemist 2
description: Return to the Middle Ages and become a powerful alchemist! This is a new sequel to the beloved game.

name: DarkSpar
description: DarkSpar is an idle / Incremental game in a retro 8-bit RPG style. Train champions in 63 skills across 3 skill trees to master godlike powers. Explore the post- apocalyptic continent of DarkSpar to find hidden artifacts and to fight ancient evils.

name: Grimace Run
description: Grimace Run is a fun free to play endless runner game based on the Grimace Coin Meme Token. Collect as many Grimace coins as you can and get some cool skins! Try to climb the leaderboard to show everyone who the boss is! Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Hidden World Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: WTC: Recruitment Day
description: After Grendel Jinx is mugged, she chases after the thief, determined to retrieve her possessions - and also recruit the person responsible

name: Zombie vs. Police
description: Zombie VS Police is an incredibly addictive third-person shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world infested with zombies. In this game you have to play as a police officer who fights zombies and protects his hometown!

name: Pow! 2
description: Great precision puzzles with physics!! You must help Spike, the Blue Ball, and take him to the target platform with the help of your friends. Calculate the timers, configure the friends, hit play, and watch the action! And remember, each second matters!

name: Space Piercer
description: make your way into their fleets to destroy them on their own field !

name: The Unknown Halls
description: TUH is a Horror Puzzle game where the player must beat a series of mazes in order to beat the game. In order to survive you must run from danger or avoid it entirely. As the player progresses each maze gets more difficult introducing a new goal of beating the game other then getting to the end.

name: Legacy: The Last Pure Heart
description: This game is a 3rd person adventure. You will be able to visit the body of many animals of the forest and learn something new about their way of life. You can both play with other animals and fight to the death. You will be able to enjoy a beautiful, realistic world.

name: Fireflies & Figments: A Willow's Journey
description: Adventure is better together! Using the buddy system, take control of two young adventurers as they journey deep into a mysterious forest full of fear and wonder, retracing the steps of teacher and KIN Willows founder, Hazel Willow, who disappeared over a century ago.

name: TitTok 2
description: TitTok - Minimalistic adventure 2D puzzle platformer with cats, explosions and spinning saws! Continuation of the first part.

name: Alchemistry
description:
Merge elements to discover new ones !

Through challenges, use the given elements to craft transitional elements to reach given objective. Or use sandbox mode to freely craft items together and maybe succeed to create rare items, and to discover everything.

name: Hate Free Heroes: Agents of Aggro City
description: Hate Free Heroes is a modern day role playing game that takes the player into the role of an H.F.H agent and researcher dedicated to decreasing the rise of "Aggromites" in the city.

name: Tales from the Cache
description: The exciting world of treasure hunting. Challenge yourself to find secret locations, solve challenging puzzles and explore abandoned places. Watch out for traps!

name: Buccaneers!
description: Buccaneers! is a first-person pirate game for PC, Xbox One and VR devices. The game is set in the Caribbean sea after the end of the Golden Age of Piracy, and explores a fictional timeline in which piracy recovers and becomes a major threat to the balance of power in the region. The player joins one of four factions and helps them to fight for dominance on land and at sea.

name: They Grew Lungs and Drowned
description:
Explore the wreckage.

Speak with the survivors.

The Permanent Food Source has run dry.

Time to move on.

name: Gash And the Ultimate Boner
description: GASH is a short retro inspired 3D platformer à la Banjo Kazooie or Conker's Bad Fur Day.

name: Wordle
description: An unofficial variant of Wordle for the NES.

name: Infection
description: This set of 7 maps should take around 45 to 60 minutes to complete on Ultra-Violence, provided you don't die too often. It is designed to be played in order, but pistol starts are possible with some added difficulty.

name: Racing: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 2 Player Cooperation Edition: Challenge Mode
description: Sin descripción

name: Ploppy Pairs
description: A card matching game for everyone! What makes Ploppy Pairs special is the SharePlay functionality, which lets you play with friends and family together via FaceTime and makes you feel as if you are all in the same place.

name: Brad Has A Pain
description: A mod for the original Lisa: The Painful game that completely redefines the game's combat, story, and writing. 27 new party members replace the game's old cast, and an entire new story featuring Brad's fight against the demonic Lisa takes place. Using a more comedic tone and serving as a love letter to the series Lisa has become, Brad Has A Pain is an entirely different experience than the original.

name: Broken Pipe
description:
Help all robots to escape from this world.
Contains several levels, open world to explore, collectibles and mini games

name: Midnight at Forest
description: Midnight at Forest is a single-player horror game created by 2 indie developers, you need to collect 5 keys in order to unlock the gate and survive. There is a large map, creepy vibes, and a few other things that you need to find out.

name: GoBangTetris
description: GoBangTetris is a game combining GoBang and Tetris. You can use a keyboard or mouse to control the falling white/black pieces. When five or more same-color pieces are in a row, column, or diagonal, they disappear, and the pieces placed above fall. Earn as many scores as possible!

name: Monster Girl Manager
description: Summon, consult, and train procedurally generated monster girls in this dungeon roguelite. Evaluate the strengths and weaknesses of different monster types as you prepare the ultimate team to defeat dangerous enemies and collect powerful artifacts.

name: Timewreck Tales
description: Fix the Timewreck in this story rich rogue-like RPG. Build up your team and collect time crystals as you battle, outwit, and discover different dimensions as Independent Time Specialists for Chronos Inc. Chronos Insurance does not cover brain warping or injuries from alternate versions of you.

name: Two Against the Legion
description: Two against the Legion is a cooperative local multiplayer adventure puzzle game for two players on a single PC, in which you have to defeat rebellious robots and prevent a technological disaster.

name: Paint Warfare
description: Paint Warfare (or PW for short) is an early access multiplayer paintball shooter FPS, with unique unlockable weapons, funky physics and a fun low-poly art style. The game features 3 3x3 and 2x2km maps, 4 vehicle classes, 3 unique game modes and fun fast-paced combat.

name: Royal Jigsaw
description: Enjoy high-quality graphics, adjustable difficulty levels and ambient music in this customizable and relaxing puzzle game that is fun for everyone! Rotate pieces to fit them in special pockets, zoom in on smaller pieces with a magnifying glass, and choose your level of difficulty with puzzles ranging from 12 pieces to 300! Replayable and suitable for players of any age, Royal Jigsaw is a game the whole family will love!

name: Advanced Shells II
description: Sin descripción

name: Memory Novel: The SPA
description: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing the naughty sexual adventures of a young woman at a SPA, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match.

name: Luigi's Mansion Beta Restoration
description:
Luigi's Mansion Beta Restoration is a 1:1 recreation of the early playable demo of Luigi's Mansion seen at E3 2001.
LMBR includes ALL of the highly requested features seen at E3 2001, including 1:1 models, visuals, music, the iconic purple scare ghost, and more!
Everything you see has been faithfully drawn down to the bone, with the most accurate assets EVER publicly displayed before. Can you find them all?

name: Sunrise Citadel
description: A single limit-removing map for Hexen, intended to be played alongside ERLBA monster mod for GZDoom, but otherwise also perfectly playable. Contains an entire hub-long quest in a single map with lots of exploration and several puzzles. Level is highly non-linear and densely populated.

name: Phobos Dere.GB
description: After uncovering a GameBoy cartridge haunted by a malignant force, a guilt-ridden scientist involved in sinister experiments must face his fears and relive the terrifying nightmares of his past.

name: Wrdl-F
description:
I couldn't allow the port old Fairchild Channel F, the first games console to use ROM cartridges, to be left out of the Wordle craze.

This ground-breaking machine, offering colour graphics in the home in 1976 when state-of-the-art arcade games were mostly monochrome until 1979, was unfortunately made obsolete with the arrival of the 2600 less than a year later.

This version features 1,175 built-in words (max ROM size is 8K). Obviously as a result it cannot check the answers you enter are valid words, so it's up to you whether you play an honest game or not...!

Hint: None of the words in the list have the same letter more than once.

name: Squaredle
description: Squaredle is a daily word finding game. Form words in a 4x4 grid by connecting letters up, down, left, right and diagonally. New puzzle every day, with harder puzzles later in the week. Includes leaderboards and special larger puzzles.

name: Crossroad Simulator
description: Control the traffic light to regulate the flow of city traffic!

name: Mirror Shoot
description: In Aranet, space is connected through mirrors. You are an agent in Aranet and you need to learn the physics in this planet and fight for resources.

name: A Community Garden Outside of Kyiv
description: Take a moment to tend to an online community garden, just outside of Kyiv.

name: Forget the Golden Witch
description: This is an Umineko no Naku Koro Ni fangame, made using the PS3 game assets and the original Umineko soundtrack. It presumes that the reader has fully read through all eight Umineko episodes.

name: 69 Estera Hot
description: 69 Estera Hot - Memory game with visual novel elements in fantasy style. Estera is the lustful owner of the old castle. She was alone for a very long time and but finally she waited for you.

name: Tails and Pines
description: Two friends, whose paths diverged once, met again after many years. However, both of them have changed and live in two different worlds now. Can they get through the old grudges in their hearts and become something more than just friends?

name: Hot Milf 4
description: Hentai is not just 2D girls, this is a whole art.

name: Harbor Tycoon
description: Manage your own shipping company! Be a maritime business owner, with control over everything in your business. Work, earn, grow and become a shipping magnate!

name: Explosiver
description: In Explosiver you will live a story with many bullets and explosions, controlling William. You'll be able to play in first person or third person, and you'll have several weapons to help you in the main objective, besides, of course, a special ability that can be used by the protagonist.

name: Bigfield 2042
description: True AAA quality.

name: Street Cats Race
description: We know kitties love running around, but a cat racing game is the first of that sort you will see. Play as a cat racer, running through many different levels and terrains, on the streets and buildings of the city, with many obstacles along the way.

name: Asterism: Apex of War
description: First and third person single player sci fi action shooter. Destroy the Neurobonded menace and prevent humanities extinction.

name: Markerboard Jungle: Frogs
description: Markerboard Jungle: Frogs is an amphibian-focused, science-based, entertaining & educational, single-player survival game and wildlife sim. Explore the lives of a variety of frogs immersed in the world of this fascinating creature.

name: Fire Emblem: Bloodlines
description: Sin descripción

name: Small Super Mario Universe
description: Sin descripción

name: Player Goes Jump
description: A quick paced platformer with enemies that you can kill to earn points and rewards!

name: Sex Adventures: Mile High Club
description: A visual novel about two young flight attendants naughty adventures on an empty private jet. An empty flight can be boring and the girls decide to make their flight more enjoyable.

name: Hentai Girls: Contact
description: The popular hentai puzzle franchise has reached a new level, now with visual novel elements! More than 20 naked pictures of AAA quality, various mechanics, female moans, three difficulty levels, gallery, 100 achievements, relaxing music and beautiful graphics

name: Technical Issues
description: Technical Issues is a large single-level WAD for Doom 2. Using stock textures and the basics, I tried to make a complete level that felt like a progressive adventure, combining various visuals styles and using traditional gameplay.

name: Vrack Botanicals
description: Vrack Botanicals is a ten-map Doom 2 episode for limit-removing ports brought to you by various members of the Doomer Boards, themed around Vrack-style bases, overgrown vegetation, and space marijuana. This month's project lead was 40oz.

name: Weezle
description: Weezle is a web-based word game created by Rivers Cuomo and programmer Marcus Ng. The game is a Weezer-themed clone of Wordle, the popular word game created by Josh Wardle.

name: Quest 64: Hard Mode
description:
Quest64 Hard Mode at it’s core is a difficulty mod of the original story that ended up getting many more changes beyond just difficulty.

A shortlist of most notable features would be
- UI Hud is always visible.
- Stat Growth and Stat Caps are changed.
- All Monster stats are modified (Most cases being 1.5X rounded up).
- Some Monsters were given specific tweaks to make them much harder than the average.
- All “Spirits” are in new locations.
- Some Treasure Chests have had their contents altered.
- Many spells altered, Rebalancing, Deleted, some New Spells entirely.
- Each “Element” is more closely balanced, so that players don’t feel forced to go Earth/Water.
- Item Effects changed
- 6 New “Items” added (2 of them have a default Icon of “White Wings” as I’m not a sprite artist)
- Unused BGM’s have been used in certain areas.
- The Start of leaving the Monastery is faster.
- Mammon’s World Changed Slightly.
- And more…

name: Uncanny
description: You must collect all items in order to escape. But you are not alone...

name: Bunflower
description:
A blizzard is heading to town and Bunflower has procrastinated- as usual. Take a break from playing arcade games to explore homes, caves, and the gloomy mushroom forest to gather enough food before the blizzard arrives!

This is my first game ever made- created in GB Studio.

name: Triangle Strategy: Tacticians's Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Overcrowded: Tycoon
description:
Do you like idle tycoon simulator games? Build the best theme park ever and become the roller coaster tycoon in the tycoon game from creators of Cut the Rope, C.A.T.S.: Crash Arena Turbo Stars, King of Thieves, and Bullet Echo. Enjoy this idle tycoon, build your theme park and become a carnival tycoon!

Manage your visitors’ emotions by constructing the most thrilling rides, tasty restaurants, and hiring the funniest mascots that your idle theme park has to offer. But watch out: your guests are very picky about their experience, so plan your strategy carefully!

name: Room Explorer 2010: Deluxe Lover's Paque
description: Room Explorer 2010: Deluxe Lover's Paque is a deluxe paque for lovers that features many deluxe goodies for fans of the 2021 PC game Room Explorer 2010.

name: Critical Slash
description:
Explore a procedurally generated world with tons of enemies, treasure, and secrets!
Vast exploration, intense battles, and awesome gear and loot! Endless level progression system!

name: Jigsaw Novel: Double Trouble
description: Layla Scott can't decide which is her favorite: the dean or the physics teacher so she takes both of them. Solve all 12 jigsaw puzzles to find out how it turned out for Layla.

name: Big Tower Tiny Square 2
description: Return to the revamped ruins of the Big Tower to rescue your Pineapple from the geometric genius, Big Square! Combining mechanics from previous Big Tower Tiny Square games, this Tower challenges you to jump, flap, bounce, and ride your way to revenge!

name: Disco Cannon Airlines
description: Welcome “Disco-Cannon-Airlines” where people are flying out from cannons directly in the sky. Get the points from kicking airplanes, cows, and trampolines. Try to reach as many points as possible.

name: Streamdle
description: Streamdle by SFMoe is a twitch chat co-op word guessing game. Let your chat guess the word or join in with them!

name: Saint Patrick's Day Run
description: Saint Patricks Day Run is a Runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels of as you complete your quest as a Lucky the Leprechaun.

name: Pokémon Ópalo
description: Pokémon Opal is a Spanish-language fangame created by developer and streamer Eric Lostie, also author of Pokémon Iberia. You will give life to a character who has the modest mission of returning prosperity to the Pokémon world. In the process you can train up to eight generations of Pokémon, visit sixteen different gyms, meet new characters and embark on a multitude of missions.

name: Music Racer: Ultimate
description:
Now you can race your own music!

Music Racer is the dynamic rhythm game loved by millions of players around the world.

The new "Ultimate" version allows you to use your own music in the game via a WebDAV server (from a computer or smartphone), as well as play to music published on the Audius service.

name: Trigger
description: Trigger is a 3d side-scrolling, photorealistic, adventure game that lets you take control of a young ball named Neo. Since you were gifted with special abilities, you will be tested on whether you're good enough to be sent on real missions.

name: Rebel
description: REBEL - is a 3D shooter with surviving elements where you will have to fight with a prison rebel.

name: Whispered Secrets: Tying the Knot - Collector's Edition
description: A typical carriage ride quickly takes a shocking turn when you encounter a cloaked criminal attacking a bride at the Osmont estate!

name: Legacy of Aeroja
description: Legacy of Aeroja is a Fantasy Action Rpg made in RPG Maker MV. It follows Aeroja as they go from newborn drake to full sized dragon, dealing with the loss of their parent and the harsh winter and people around them. A tale of excess awaits.

name: The Impossible Game 2
description: Your 12-year wait is over: the original rhythm platform game is back! Test your skills with all-new levels, online battle royale and more.

name: Offroad Night Racing
description: Begin your adventure in the wilds today! This new and exciting offroad driving game lets you prove yourself in the rough terrain, driving and completing multiple different tasks!

name: ABC Match with Me
description: A great introduction to puzzle games for your child that develops logical thinking, problem solving and many other skills from early childhood! Smart interface designed in a child-friendly style will allow your child to enjoy the game as soon as they start it!

name: Goddess of War Ashley II
description: "Goddess of War Ashley Ⅱ" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the air.

name: Monsters and Warriors
description: Monsters and Warriors - Onet Match Connect is a super fun matching game with cool challenges and brain teasers! Enjoy hours of fun connecting images of Monsters and Warriors. Test your skills by matching and linking the same kind of images and work your way up to victory!

name: Evan Quest 2
description: EVAN QUEST 2 - Bad Dudes have taken over the city again. The DoD sends in Evan Quest to stop them. Clear the Bad Dudes from several progressively challenging levels.

name: Sharing Lights
description: Gather all your grey matter and enter the dungeon. Sharing Lights is a 3D isometric puzzler in which you control multiple Ghosts at the same time. Manage their lights and use their abilities cleverly to reach the Architect and find the exit.

name: Queenchantment
description: The Lich Queen needs your help to achieve her ultimate goal. Ready your troops and set your traps to hold the incoming kingdom soldiers and their allies in a 2D tower defense game!

name: Lost Sunday Comics
description: Lost Sunday Comics is a virtual comic book library where you can enjoy in discreet, magical settings original, new and exciting works of art from carefully selected comic book artists.

name: Captain CigArrr
description: Captain CigArrr is a third-person naval combat game where the player has to focus on completing objectives and killing enemies on different maps.

name: Succubus Girl Story
description: You most want to summon the Succubus Girl. She rules the underworld. You inadvertently performed the ritual and called her to your home. What will you do with an angry beast?

name: Adventure Trip: Wonders of the World
description: If you are a virtual bird but love adventure too, this game is just for you. Take an Adventure Trip to Wonders of The World.

name: Boris the Sloth
description: Channel your inner sloth in this challenging nature-based puzzle platforming adventure game. Transition between the world of the living and the spirit realm where you will use your abilities to move objects, alter gravity, and warp time in order to solve puzzles and fight off dangerous animals.

name: Late Photographer 3
description: This is a game of drawing cards and collecting cards.

name: Nerraia
description: In this platform and adventure game, you will play for 3 different stage to save the Nitia island.

name: Panelki
description: A utility worker earns for a ticket to leave the endless Siberian city of panel houses. Permafrost, day/night cycle, dynamic weather and open world. Feel the atmosphere of the northern city, having been in the role of a handyman.

name: Sharing Lights
description: Gather all your grey matter and enter the dungeon. Sharing Lights is a 3D isometric puzzler in which you control multiple Ghosts at the same time. Manage their lights and use their abilities cleverly to reach the Architect and find the exit.

name: Earth is too small for me
description: A simple TPS game. The strongest man is back. Manipulate "The Strongest Legend" and infiltrate the enemy dungeon. Of course, please don't forget to rescue the lady !

name: Koncolos
description: Explore the hidden aspects of a living left ages behind, where ordinary folk, mages and monsters live together. Koncolos: Prologue is a visual novel that tells the story of common people taking on legendary monsters.

name: Barry of Wrath
description: A fantasy adventure that will take the players on a journey they wanted nothing to do with!

name: Project Xmas
description: Project XMAS is a retro style, horror, single - player game where you need to return to your home... The map is completely procedurallygenerated so every approach will be differend and specific.

name: Kongfu VR
description: The earth was invaded by the demon race again.This time, they have gathered ancient fierce beasts. As one of the most valiant warriors, Defend them with your weapons! - Defend! The! Frontier!

name: 3D Puzzle: Wood House
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

name: Village of Zombies: Abandoned City
description: This DLC includes an additional weapon, an additional character and a new map that can be played with up to 4 players in online co-op or alone in single player.

name: Automon
description: Fast-paced auto-battler. Fight, capture and upgrade Automons, build a diverse party, battle bad Bosses and become the Automon Champion!

name: The Odyssey of the Mammoth
description: Through lavish but perilous landscapes, assist a mammoth mother and her child escape from their extinction. Discover breathtaking views from 12,000 years ago. Beware of the increasingly hostile environment. Protect your offspring from the hunters tracking you and send them flying!

name: Mannequin the Passing
description: Mannequin The Passing is a single-player psychological horror game. Get through the stages watching the mannequins carefully as some show signs of wanting to stop you. Use patience and observational skills to get through and survive the passing mannequin experience.

name: Citywars Tower Defense
description: Citywars Tower Defense is a mix between a survival game and a tower defense. Craft your tools, gather resources to build your towers, fight incoming monsters, level up your weapons each with unique skill trees, enchant your armor and play with your friends coop or split screen and more!

name: Kibbi Keeper
description: Forage, explore, tame, and wrangle your adorable companions in this beautiful first-person, virtual-pet, adventure game!

name: 2310 seconds in Hell
description: This is a very short game. Has an average level of difficulty. If you do not know what to do, then try to complete this game in less than 2310 seconds.

name: The Battle Never Ends
description: The Battle Never Ends is a horror-adventure RPG game that users able to investigate the surroundings and interact with the battle space.

name: Commuter
description: Commuter is a top-down 2D pixel art driving game inspired by old-school arcade games.

name: Sokobot
description: Sokobot is an open-ended puzzle game where you place down cute robots, give them commands, and create infinitely-looping assembly lines that combine shapes together!

name: Totally Convenient
description: A brain-melting multi-tasking eye-hand coordination game. Use all kinds of weird machines and react quickly to throw delicious food to demanding customers! Playable with only 4 buttons in more than 75 levels : That's totally convenient!

name: Cosmos Conquer
description: The technologically advanced humanity starts looking for other planets to conquer. Now that the Earth is depleted of its resources, we're looking for them elsewhere. The Universe is open for us now - and it cannot hide any secrets. So how will you conquer it?

name: Ryan's Rescue Squad
description: Rescue Ryan’s friends from Dark Titan and his evil allies! Explore four worlds packed with slime, hilarious characters, and unlockable costumes on an unforgettable platforming adventure!

name: Ashwalkers: A Survival Journey - Survivor's Edition
description:
A Special physical edition of Ashwalkers: A survival Journey, including;

- A game cover sheath
- An art book
- A sheet of stickers of the game’s characters.

name: What Lies in the Multiverse
description: What Lies in the Multiverse is a story-driven 2D adventure that one could call a dramatic comedy. Filled to the brim with hilarious, cartoonish hijinks, the narrative also presents the player with mature and deep themes like death, envy, and obsession.

name: Crossing Guard Joe
description: In Monoxide City where the cars don't stop, only one man can help kids cross the street.

name: PaintballX
description: PaintballX is an online mutliplayer FPS paintball game! Battle your friends in a casual paintball FPS!

name: Gran Turismo 7: Launch Edition
description:
Gran Turismo 7 brings together the very best features of the Real Driving Simulator. Whether you’re a competitive or casual racer, collector, tuner, livery designer or photographer – find your line with a staggering collection of game modes including fan-favorites like GT Campaign, Arcade and Driving School. With the reintroduction of the legendary GT Simulation Mode, buy, tune, race and sell your way through a rewarding solo campaign as you unlock new cars and challenges. And if you love going head-to-head with others, hone your skills and compete in the GT Sport Mode.

Gran Turismo 7: Launch Edition includes:
- 100,000 CR (in-game credit)
- Three-car pack, including:
- Mazda RX-Vision Stealth Model
- Porsche 917 Living Legend
- Toyota Supra GT500 Castrol TOM’S

name: Torins Towers: Rise of Heroes
description:
Torins Towers is a thrilling, free-to-play Action Strategy Game RTS, offering fast-paced multiplayer matches and a rich campaign of 80 singleplayer levels.
Unlike traditional strategy games, your army is your most crucial resource here, serving multiple purposes - from building and upgrading to direct engagement in attacks.

name: PumPum
description: PumPum Is an addicting hentai puzzle game with many hot girls that you must collect! Each girl shows off lovely graphics and animations!

name: Limb Hunter
description: Shoot. Loot. Attach. Repeat. At your leisure you can save the dying world or become the ruler for the final decades of corruption. But who cares about the future, when you can attach that big gun to your spine. Become a Legend of DC-128b. At least for a while.

name: Gunborg: Dark Matters
description: Gunborg: Dark Matters is an action arcade platformer. Take on an army of alien soldiers and killer robots while making your way through a giant spaceship.

name: Godsbane
description: Craft explosive combos of units and powers to use in head-to-head auto battler combat against players worldwide. Outplay your opponent with strategic maneuvers and watch the battle unfold on a tabletop arena. Win matches to climb the ranks and become Godlike in this lunchtime eSport!

name: Survival Quiz City
description:
Survival Quiz City is a multiplayer Survival Quiz Action game where only your smarts and skills will help you survive! Players answer questions and divide into two groups: the winners (correct answers) and the losers (incorrect answers). Fight as a team to win each round and survive to become the winner!

The game is set to shutdown on October 31st with the option to transfer data to the new Japanese only free-to-play version of the game launching on October 12th.

name: Triangle Strategy
description: Three nations battle for control of the dwindling resources of salt and iron in this HD-2D adventure tactical RPG. Featuring deep gameplay full of choices and consequences, strategically survey the battlefield to gain the upper hand.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Gran Turismo 7
description: Gran Turismo 7 brings together the very best features of the Real Driving Simulator. Whether you’re a competitive or casual racer, collector, tuner, livery designer or photographer – find your line with a staggering collection of game modes including fan-favorites like GT Campaign, Arcade and Driving School. With the reintroduction of the legendary GT Simulation Mode, buy, tune, race and sell your way through a rewarding solo campaign as you unlock new cars and challenges. And if you love going head-to-head with others, hone your skills and compete in the GT Sport Mode.

name: The Last Front
description: There have been hundreds wars in the world due to the land and this wars will continue.The Last Front is a game which tell one of this wars it is low poly style and also has first person perspective.

name: Lero
description: In a fantastic world with full of magic, dragons, underground creatures and heavenly creatures; let's see if our hero LERO is going to save the good people of realm from the evil by using his skills. Destiny of the realm is in your hands...

name: Hyper School Simulator
description: Play the latest anime virtual high school life on Japanese pixel city! Drive car or any vehicles, attack peoples, or become the gangster, you can do it all only on anime city. The city is based on real Japanese real city. While you have to fight to gain kawaii senpai love and date him/her. Build your own metaverse land on metaverse sandbox town!

name: Goomba Racing
description:
Nyoom! It's time to race and drift with the SmoloMyth girls!
Goomba racing is a mario-kart like game where you zoom around in KFP on Roombas!

name: Ongeki Bright Memory
description: Expanded version of the previous entry in Sega's arcade rhythm gacha series.

name: Rich Maser: Cash King
description: Rich Master is a casual mobile game that combines the excitement of collecting and trading with the thrill of building and developing your own village. The goal is to collect as many coins as possible and use them to upgrade your village, build new structures, and compete against other players in game challenges.

name: Gyakuten Live!
description: Gyakuten Live! is a Love Live fangame with Ace Attorney-style gameplay. Travel through the adventures of your favourite school idols as you solve mysteries and prove the innocence of your clients. Currently has: 2 episodes, with more on the way!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: SSR Fletchers Crawfords GE C44aci Pack
description: Drive the Australian C44Aci diesel locomotives, in the Crawfords (PHC class), Fletchers/SSR (FIE class), and Southern Shorthaul Railroad (CEY class) liveries, each with multiple weathering levels and custom features.

name: Dance Around
description:
A dance game that anybody can play! Dance Around is the newest dance game in Bemani's arcade lineup, following in the footsteps of DanceEvolution Arcade with a full motion capture dance game, featuring choreographed routines for all levels of play.

Dance together in real-time with the AI on screen as the camera captures your movements.

By following the timeline at the top of the screen, players can see what moves are coming up next.

Select from light, standard, or training mode, and even capture motion data of the moves you did on screen, exported as your selected avatar following along on your mobile device.

name: Laser Cannon 3
description: A monster shooter wanted! They are clever and tend to hide in deep holes and behind steel gates. Only a smart shooter can get them. Are you the one? Pass all the levels of the physics game online free and prove a sharp shooter. Shoot explosives to hit few targets at once and gain combo. The less shots it takes to pass a level, the more stars you gain. You can replay any physics-based puzzles as much as you want, because full version game is available free online without limitation or registration. Can you collect all achievements in the logic shooting game? Find it out now!

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Wolf Predator
description: Become the master Xenomorph hunter and play as the most lethal foe your enemies will face in combat. This DLC pack includes the Wolf Predator premium class.

name: Cemantle & Pedantle
description:
Daily word games that can be played solo or collaboratively in a team and gives players a daily ranking.
In Cemantle, players have to find a secret word by trying to get as close as possible in its semantic field.
In Pedantle, players must uncover a Wikipedia page by guessing each word of its intro following the same tules as cémantix.

name: Hyde and Seek
description:
A story-based board game you experience with a set of dice and fistfights!
Kate, the 'London's Flaming Fist,' is waiting for you to join her exciting adventure!

'Kate,' who becomes one of the wanted criminals overnight, disguises herself as a man and runs away.
Will she be able to reveal the unimaginably horrific secret surrounding her,
escape from the gangsters, and return to her dear Dr. Jekyll's laboratory?
The final result depends on your choices!

name: Sukebe Blocks
description: A fast-paced BRAKOUT game reminiscent of the old Internet FLASH games (DATSUI BLOCK-KUZUSHI). Can be played with mouse only.

name: Farm Manager 2022
description:
In Farm Manager 2022 you will find even more plant species to grow. Now also organic ones! Grow celery, carrots, currants, gooseberries, onions and more. Observe plant growth. The new mechanics allow automatic field management using available employees and machines.
Enjoy a variety of machines that you can use when working in the field. Buy and sell them on the stock market. Look for bargains among used machines. You will find bees, sheep, goats, chickens, turkeys, ducks, geese and cows. For the first time, you will be able to set up a fish farm, ostrich, wild boar and quail farm.

Logistics center, mechanic's garage, veterinary center and much more! The logistics center will allow you to transport larger quantities of resources and products easier and faster. In the mechanic’s garage, they will take care of your agricultural machinery. Employees from the veterinary center will ensure the health of your farm

name: Diary of Broken Dreams
description:
Diary of Broken Dreams is a deeply personal psychological horror game about suicidal depression, childhood trauma, emotional abuse, and the fear of one's own emotions. It's about the authors very own mind. It's about his story.

The game builds its atmosphere through depictions of the author's mental illnesses and memories, portraying how they affect him in a nightmare-dreamlike aesthetic reminiscent of the classic Silent Hill games.

name: Love on Beach
description: Some things won't happen again. Everybody has their future.

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Inevitable Excess
description: Answer a plea from a powerful entity and defend the space-time continuum against imminent collapse. Use your unparalleled mythic powers to do battle with truly invincible opponents.

name: Words With Freds
description: Guess the word in six tries or less!

name: The Day We Met was a Regular Day in the Infinitely Looping Highschool, is That Normal?
description: The story tells a mind-boggling suspense-filled adventure story on campus. The game is played via two main elements: text interaction and scene decryption. If you are interested in text-based adventure games, science fiction, and a certain big big big big pink cat, please do not miss it.

name: Horror In Valkeala
description: Solve puzzles and mysteries and try find hidden Valkeala logo at this Fps horror puzzle

name: Arcade Archives: Dragon Spirit
description: Dragon Spirit is a shooting game released by Namco in 1987. Control Amul, a hero who's been transformed into the Blue Dragon, and save Princess Alicia of Midgard who was taken by the dark lord Zawell. Battle enemies on the ground and in the air, and use power-up items to progress through the areas.

name: Bouldering Robot 3D
description: Bouldering action game!This robot can neither walk nor jump.Only hang and shift its weight.Swing and Jump as you head for the goal at the top!Total 9 stages

name: Vision Memory Maze
description: vision\memory\maze - a maze game with visual memory and logic.

name: Vigorus
description: Vigorus is a visually stunning rhythm platformer, a musical adventure into a bizarre world, with a talking frog puppet as your guide. While playing, become our girl Vigorus, retrieve the memory once was lost, and help your little companion to save the world from monsters.

name: Menseki Genius
description: That satisfying feeling that comes from solving a puzzle! Menseki Genius is a novel Japanese logic puzzle game that's been attracting attention from around the world. This Genius version is a compilation of the most difficult puzzles included in Menseki: Area Maze Puzzles, for the most expert players. Find your way to the solution, deducing unknown lengths and areas from known lengths and areas. All you need is the "length x breadth = area" formula for calculating the area of a rectangle!

name: Pretty Girls Breakers!
description: Classic brick-breaking action gets a cute and cuddly twist in Pretty Girls Breakers! In this classic arcade-style action puzzler, take the role of a twin-tailed fighter wielding a beam saber. You'll have to strike incoming balls with precision to destroy block patterns above you, all while avoiding enemy attacks and collecting power-ups to gain the upper hand!

name: Counter Delta: The Bullet Rain
description: Counter Delta: The Bullet Rain is a solo single player/third-person shooter. Enjoy a thrilling TPS game with a diverse play mode and various weapons that can be unlocked by leveling up.

name: SCP: Vacation
description: 1-4 Player PvP Party-Board Game with Minigames based in the SCP Foundation universe

name: Dymension
description: Dymension is a horror first-person game where you have to plunge into a complicated story that at first glance seems simple, but hides a lot of details and puzzles. You're alone in the dark only to survive this night.

name: Idiotic
description: Switch between alternate dimensions at will in this fast-paced single-player FPS game. Wreak chaos and improve your character as you move at break-neck speed.

name: Saffron Fields
description: An arcade game about a little brave tank fighting terrorists and drug dealing PMCs. Play campaign or endless mode with your friends. Brawl enemies out of fight. Defeat mighty bosses. Bring peace to the Saffron Fields!

name: Paladin's Oath
description: Paladin's Oath combines elements of RPG and light deck-building where Cards / Mana / Recruitable Followers and always-on Blessings must be synergized to Move, Interact and Battle with unlimited undo mechanics during battles to find the best possible outcome.

name: Oogy: Can You Help
description: Play as a business card-wielding sheep in this mysterious indie narrative deckbuilder. Explore a character-rich map, collect new mechanics, uncover dark mysteries, and make new friends. Oh—plus secrets, bosses, and all original music with a hand-drawn art style!

name: Blockgeon
description: Pick your team with 3 adventurers, explore and clean the dungeon! Cast your skill based on Color Matching to destroy incoming blocks with every round and try to damage the dungeon’s boss when you can. Colour and pattern matching dungeon adventure await you!

name: Beholder 3
description: When a high-ranking security officer saves you from prison, you end up a pawn in her schemes. Now you must eliminate anyone standing in the way of her secret plans and try to get your life back while working two jobs. No tenant, employee or superior is safe from your spying.

name: Ghostrunner: Project Hel
description:
Take control of Hel, one of the original games’ bosses, as she descends Dharma Tower on a bloody quest of her own. Designed to appeal to new players and veterans, she’s more combat-oriented and can survive an additional attack compared to the Ghostrunner.

Run on walls, soar through neon cityscapes, and slice through six levels while mastering Hel’s powers through her own ability progression system. Battle new enemies and bosses to the beat of six fresh tracks courtesy of electronic musician Daniel Deluxe.

name: Find All 2: Middle Ages
description: This is a sequel to the FIND ALL game. This time you will be looking for items in the Middle Ages. Search for over 350 hidden objects. A game for all ages.

name: Ari's Journey
description: A retro precision platformer in a top-down action packed story. Navigate tight corridors and fly at high speeds using precise timing. A precision platformer without any platforms.

name: Objective H.A.S.T.E.: Survival Horror Escape
description: Objective H.A.S.T.E. - is a first-person 3D survival game in the horror genre. Have you ever imagined that your school could be under attack by terrorists, so the only good thing would be that the lessons would be canceled? I bet you did. This game can allow you to visit such a situation.

name: Northgard: Svardilfari, Clan of the Horse
description: Led by Brok and Eitria, two spirited siblings, the Clan of the Horse are a quiet and sturdy people. They are also recognized by all as the best craftsmen and women of the known world.

name: Teabat!
description: Teabat! is a stylish retro 2D adventure with fast, tight controls, and a large interconnected map full of secrets and beautifully constructed set-pieces!

name: Dexter Stardust: Adventures in Outer Space
description: A spacey classic adventure for all! Dexter Stardust: Adventures in Outer Space is a classic point and click adventure; you can walk, talk, and interact with everything in your surroundings. Use and pick up inventory items to solve puzzles in over 100 unique scenes. Playing Dexter Stardust is like watching back to back episodes of a Saturday morning cartoon! With 5 total episodes, feel free to jump to or replay any episode you’d like, at any time.

name: LongCat
description: LongCat is a puzzle game inspired by the minigame from the Fancade Android game.

name: Babylon's Fall
description: Join a group of warriors bonded with special equipment called Gideon Coffins in an odyssey to overcome the titanic Tower of Babylon. Wield unique weapons in both hands, and use the power of the Gideon Coffin, allowing for combinations of up to four weapons at once. The capabilities of different equipment will also bring endless strategic variation to combat. Game visuals are achieved using a newly developed “brushwork style” to create a unique fantasy setting with a medieval oil painting aesthetic. Play in co-op online multiplayer for up to 4 players. The game will feature a range of game modes post launch at no additional cost.

name: Keeper of the Grove 2
description: Protect the magic gems in this free defense game online. Different creeps are already marching the roads intended to steal the jewels. Your task is to place the magic defenders on the strategic spots along the paths and defeat the enemy. Stone golems have enough fire power, but are ineffective against fast targets. Thus, team them up with water elementals that slow villains down. Created by the huge fans of the best arcade games online, this h5 game has a range of nice features for core players. For instance, it's one of the defense games with hard mode accesiible right in the main menu. It also offers enemy wave acceleration option and features a number of achievements and an extensive guide. Consult it to learn more about the skills of attackers and defenders, and revise magic spells. It's one of those online arcade games for boys and girls to enjoy equally.

name: Diamon Jones and the Amulet of the World
description: Classical Point & Click Action Adventure game set in the ancient world of Egypt. Help Diamon Jones become the rich and famous hero he wants to be, as you explore the Pharaohs` temples and find amazing treasures.

name: MogMog Planet
description:
It's a simple match 3 puzzle that anyone can pick up and play!
Clear puzzle stages to obtain Stars and use them to create your very own MOG MOG PLANET! The more planets you own, the more animal friends you will unlock.

name: One Humanity
description: One Humanity is a new level for the 1994 id Software release DOOM II created by John Romero to support the people of Ukraine and the humanitarian efforts of the Red Cross and the UN Central Emergency Response Fund. 100% of the proceeds go toward this support.

name: Paimordle
description: Paimordle is a Genshin Impact themed version of Wordle.

name: Duotrigordle
description: A daily guessing game in which players must identify 32 hidden target words within 37 guesses. Each guess will reveal information about the correct letters contained within each word, and their positions within the word.

name: Windsor
description: Windsor is a massively multiplayer strategy game. Look forward or backward in time as you plan your moves to bring your kingdom to victory

name: Banana Hunter
description: Banana hunter - A prehistoric banana lover goes on his hunt in this unusual platformer! Collect goodies from the hordes of enemies and make your way into the light of your tribe's hot fire to survive!

name: Racing Xtreme: Fast Rally Driver 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Immortal Love: True Treasure - Collector's Edition
description: Not all that glitters is gold...

name: Elec Dude
description: Collect all Energy in each Level and face Dr. Dark Glass.

name: Miami Sunset Drive
description: miami sunset drive - Eternal sunset, wind from the coast in your face and synthwave driving your favorite car - that's what awaits you in this variation of an endless runner about racing cars and Miami!

name: Bad Cat
description: There are many different burgers in the world: a bacon burger, a chicken burger, a royal burger. But there is also a cat named Burger, and this guy is definitely too tough for you.

name: RogueClick
description: RogueClick is an incremental RPG where you fight creatures, unlock equipment, and vanquish bosses! Click to swing your mighty sword and slay mystical creatures that drop coins and gems. These resources enable you to unlock new equipment to become stronger! Complete quests and play Endless mode to amass even more wealth!

name: Yum Collector
description:
Deciding to change your life dramatically, you take care of a little dog from a shelter, but bad luck - he is constantly very hungry!

Tidy up your kitchen by matching identical treats together to feed your ravenous pet in this quirky version of the mahjong connect game. Connect and remove pairs, use hints and shuffle the playing field if the combinations are over and save the dog from hunger!

name: Deliver Us From Evil: Cadenza
description: Deliver Us From Evil: Cadenza includes the man you wanted to date but couldn't — the elusive and striking Lord Keldran. His route comes as a polygamous romance option with bad boy, Ace. Capture the hearts of two hot men through a whirlwind of passion and mystery.

name: Zombie City
description: Zombie City is a game developed exclusively for virtual reality in the shooter genre. Zombie City immerses you in the very epicenter of the zombie apocalypse. This game will take you headlong into a post-apocalyptic world where you will need to shoot zombies.

name: Pixel Trouble
description: Pixel trouble - In this unusual platformer, you take on the role of a dim-witted knight who decided to become famous by accomplishing several feats. He chose the ghosts who fled from the cemetery as his goal, but here's the bad luck - the sword cannot injure the undead!

name: Quasimorphosis: Exordium
description: Sci-fi roguelike with tactical missions and survival horror elements. Take the role of a PMC fighter and find out the situation on the Frantsev-7 space station in the orbit of Saturn.

name: Scare: Project of Fear
description: Scare: Project of Fear is a survival horror game in which you must escape a murderous monster in an old Japanese mansion.

name: Buccaneers! The New Age of Piracy
description: Witness the rise of piracy in this prologue to Buccaneers!, a classic pirate RPG. Command and customise a powerful warship on PC or in VR and take part in tense naval and land battles that will put your swashbuckling skills to the test.

name: Trapped In Stone
description: Linear World War 2 horror game where you play as a German Soldier who gets trapped inside a Bunker By Americans. Looking for a way out, things take a darker turn when he discovers a human war weapon.

name: Blastocitos
description: To start the game, select a level from the suggested ones. Start your journey and defeat the boss to go further.

name: ITRP: Volatile Vertex
description: If you see a ledge, it means it has a reason for being there. A three-dimensional puzzle platformer in which you change the gravity in three axes. Walk on walls or stand on the ceiling. Do whatever you want. The main thing is to get out of here.

name: Our Battle Has Just Begun! Episode 2
description: Roseail, the forest country, consists of a vast woodland dotted with elven and beastmen towns. After leaving Alard, the country of plenty, the Hero and his party visit Jarn, a Roseailian town with a booming dungeon business. Since no national ceremonies are planned this time around, the Hero looks forward to a leisurely stay. That is until he meets the commander of the guard, an adventurer, and a visiting representative of Roseail. What secrets dwell in the adventurers' coveted dungeons? Follow the Hero and his party as they face brand new challenges in a novel land!

name: Zadel Princess
description: Do you like to challenge yourself with interesting quizzes while experiencing the JRPG elements, building characters, and forming squads to overcome the scary monsters.

name: Wrath of Anias
description: Explore the sandbox, collect treasures, and find your way off of the island.

name: Club Soccer Director 2022
description: Take control of a Real Football Club or create your own club, in Club Soccer Director 2022 a fast-paced Football Club Management Game. Download Club Soccer Director 2022 now for FREE & start your Football management journey.

name: Zombie Rollerz: Pinball Heroes
description: Zombie Rollerz: Pinball Heroes is the ultimate mashup of classic pinball, zombie defense and rogue-like! Shoot, slam and smash your way through hordes of zombies and epic boss fights. Select your hero, it's time to become a pinball wizard!

name: 100 Doors: Escape from Work
description: This escape logic puzzle game takes you to the most beautiful company in the world. Just when you're busy looking around, you find out that you can't leave. Solve the puzzles, find the keys to all of the doors & escape from work!

name: A Musical Story
description:
‘A Musical Story’ is a rhythm game set against a 70s backdrop.
A Musical Story is the debut game from independent French developer, Glee-Cheese Studio.

name: HordeCore
description: HordeCore is a kick-ass action side-scroller set in a post-apocalyptic world. Become the leader of an ever-expanding group of survivors. Manage supplies, upgrade your team, and craft deadly contraptions to defend yourself! Remember, exploration is vital in this harsh new world. Prepare to forge bizarre alliances and, together, face the many dangers of the wastelands. Take survival gameplay, combine it with base management, add RPG elements, and spice it up with a fully-fledged collectible card game - and you get HordeCore!

name: Under A Stone Blanket
description: Small tomb / crypt brick map built within a 1024^3 volume, textured with Makkon and based on Progs_dump (included).

name: Fallout 76: Season 8 - A Better Life Underground
description: A Better Life Underground was the 8th season in Fallout 76. It began on March 1, 2022, with the release of the Invaders from Beyond update. It follows Zorbo's Revenge.

name: Pokepia: Pokecolo Utopia
description:
Welcome to the world of Pokepia!
This is our utopia, where you can wear the clothes you like, talk to the people you like, and talk about what you like.
Change into 3D clothes that can be enjoyed from any angle, and go out to your friend's star!

name: Frozen: Laptop Magic Tech
description: Sin descripción

name: Illusion
description: It was only after I and my buddies escaped from the terrifying laboratory that I realized that there might be a bigger conspiracy behind it. The adventure is far from over, But don't forget, what's happening here is just the beginning.

name: B-Rain
description: It is a game that must survive as long as possible by matching the color of the player with the bullets flying from all directions.

name: Gladiator School
description: Sin descripción

name: Rockman 6: After Tournament
description:
Sequel of Rockman6 Shadow Game? Recommend to use special weapons. About special weapons, see read [Weapons].

You have Rush adaptors and Beat from game’s start.

If you lose the game, you can go back 8 robot master’s stages even when you start Mr.X’s stage. And the progress of Mr.X and Dr.Wily’s stage is maintained.

name: FAR: Universe Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Cheato's Challenges
description: Sin descripción

name: Who Are Ya
description: Each day brings a new footballer to guess in this unique football quiz

name: Era7: Game of Truth
description: Era7: Game of Truth is a unique gaming experience that combines the excitement of a trading card game with the immersive world of a metaverse. Players can collect, trade, and play with NFT cards while also exploring a vast online world with its own economy and social interactions.

name: Six-Sided Streets
description: Make a pleasant little town, 3 hexes at a time. A tile-laying game by Chris Klimowski.

name: Gherbert Groundhog in Save the Date
description:
Gherbert had just got his burrow laid out perfectly for his upcoming date with his sweetheart. Unfortunately his jealous crazy critter neighbours broke in and stole his belongings. With only hours to go until his big date Gherbert must venture outside to find his stuff and get back to tidy up before his date arrives at 8pm.

A traditional retro pixel art platform game. Collect the objects while avoiding the critters before the time runs out!

name: Lost Direction
description:
Explore an truly infinite space of pure discovery and full of secrets, find things not meant for your eyes, discover places no one else has, and truly lose direction, all whilst being completely and utterly alone...

Or are you?

name: SnowRunner: Crocodile Pack
description:
The Crocodile Pack includes:
• The Step 33-64 “Crocodile” truck
• A Sideboard add-on
• A Maintenance Frame add-on
• A Small Fuel Carrier add-on

name: Pokémon Go: Season of Alola
description: The sixth implementation of seasons intersected with the Spring season in Northern Hemisphere and Autumn season in the Southern Hemisphere. A theme of this season is the inclusion and addition of Alola Pokémon

name: Draw Saber
description:
Draw your sword's trajectory, cut your enemy!
Watch out for your opponent's attack.

name: Miz: Myth of Imaginary Zone
description:
Simple Hack & Slash DRPG.
A text-based classic dungeon RPG.

name: High School Vampire Girlfriend
description:
Your school's sports festival is in full swing, but you’ve never been a fan. As you escape the crowd, you feel a chilling gaze…

Turning, you spot a pale girl you don't recognize. When you approach to say hi, she lunges at you!

Suddenly thrust into the treacherous world of high school vampires, can you navigate their dangerous secrets and find romance, or will they bleed you dry?

name: Pokémon Void
description: The Stronym region is being rebuilt by the initiative Odin Corporation and is looking for trainers to help raise strong Pokémon for their cause. The restoration effort is a significant task, and everyone has to do their part, even you. Join alongside Chad, Tyrone, and the corporation's commanders as you complete assignments and become a seasoned trainer. However, as you get tougher, so do your enemies. It's a daunting feat, think you're up to the challenge?

name: Galactic Bar Fight VR
description:
Get ready for a Galactic Bar Fight!

Galactic Bar Fight is a fast-paced arena combat game starting in Pegasus, an intergalactic watering hole in the distant future and then take a tour across the galaxy to various environments all over.

name: Knockout City: Season 5 - Greatest Hits
description: We’re rolling into a non-stop block of all the chart-topping hits from Year 1 in Knockout City! There are no commercials and no fillers in Season 5: Greatest Hits! We’ve brought back five Playlists you know and love: one every two weeks! Plus, we scrambled up a twist on an old classic for the Mid-Season Event that’ll have you hopping wild. Each Limited-Time event will feature many of the cosmetics, Ultimate Holograms, Intro Poses and MVP Poses that you’ve been waiting for a chance to see in the Shop again, along with unique items that we’re releasing for the first time! There’s never been a better time to experience the best that this City has to offer!

name: Phoenix Point: Kaos Engines
description:
Take a drive on the wild side with DLC 5: Kaos Engines. This vehicular focused DLC features a brand new vehicle, the Kaos Buggy, and tons of vehicle customization options for all your existing vehicles, too. Plus, try out new and unpredictable Kaos Tech weaponry: great power, but also great risk!

Of course, DLC 5 also includes new missions, new research, and an all-new marketplace to buy gear and technology.

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Glitch
description: The Glitch Season brings a new Champion into the fray. It also introduces some really huge changes, including a new lobby where you can choose where you’ll spawn, weapon skins, and a new leveling system.

name: Illusion
description: It was only after I and my buddies escaped from the terrifying laboratory that I realized that there might be a bigger conspiracy behind it. The adventure is far from over, But don't forget, what's happening here is just the beginning.

name: Lawn Buster for Hire
description: This game takes about 10 minutes to complete, and there are 5 different endings based on your decisions.

name: Clicker Cats: RPG Idle Heroes
description:
Kit just inherited his grandma's tavern and wants to fix it so heroes from all around the world can rest and enjoy some quiet time between epic adventures!
Castle Cats is a relaxing RPG idle game where you send your heroes to quests to find new treasures for your tavern!

name: EEP 17
description: Anniversary edition: For the 30th anniversary of TREND Verlag, discover the new version of the most innovative, complete and reliable railway simulation.

name: Farmer's Defence
description: Farmer’s Defence is a Casual Farming Sim where you take care of growing and selling high quality plants while defending them from the constantly increasing spread of weeds.

name: Isekai Adventure
description: This is an rpg where you can create your own character with the skill tree and portrait reading function, and explore a different world where the map changes every time you play. Take control of the powerful cheat skills given to you by the goddesses and travel the other world!

name: Forget Westbury Falls: Disc One
description: In the year 2040, the town of Westbury Falls becomes the site of a multitude of unexplained events. When a petty conflict distracts its residents, it falls to a handful of unlikely people to fight against the greater evil in the shadows. Featuring Jake!

name: Super Slinger
description: Super Slinger is a cute and funny pixelated arcade-like shooter where you fight against the alien invasion in an attempt to send them back home. Cute art, juicy gameplay, difficult stages, and SLINGSHOTS!

name: Spectrum
description: A beautiful puzzle game

name: Tear of Time: Lost Memory
description: Is an adventure game. You play as a character who, waking up in a house on a remote island, realizes that she has lost her memory. Player will have to find out the reason for the loss of memory, explore the island, find ancient treasures, explore the ruins with secret locations and solve puzzles.

name: Solitaire Bonbon
description: Cook lots of sweets and enjoy it! 200 levels in the sweet world theme!

name: Undeads vs. Humans
description: A Tower Defense with deck of cards. Unlock cards and build your own deck to beat the levels. Easy to play but hard to master.

name: Simple Mini Golf
description: Simply mini golf, playable up to 8 players!

name: Search All: Spiders
description: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the spiders in a large location. Spiders will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Search All: Mushrooms
description: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the mushrooms in a large location. Mushrooms will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Search All: Cactuses
description: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the cacti in a large location. Cacti will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Lonely Tribes
description: Merge all of the people together!

name: Mini Island: Aroma
description: Mini Island: Aroma is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty!

name: Garden Madness
description: Garden Madness - A game in the style of "Hit the Mole", by pressing certain buttons at a certain moment, we beat the moles emerging from their holes to dynamic music, collecting points and bonuses for successful hits in a row.

name: Ballotron
description: Sin descripción

name: Outdoor Adventures With Marisa Kirisame
description: Go fishing, talk by a cozy campfire, and even hold hands with Marisa Kirisame from the Touhou Project as you go out with her in this short and cozy visual novel!

name: Aperture Desk Job
description:
Aperture Desk Job reimagines the been-there-done-that genre of walking simulators and puts them in the lightning-spanked, endorphin-gorged world of sitting still behind things.

You play as an entry-level nobody on their first day at work — your heart full of hope and your legs full of dreams, eager to climb that corporate ladder. But life’s got other plans, and they all involve chairs.

Designed as a free playable short for Valve’s new Steam Deck, Desk Job walks you through the handheld’s controls and features, while not being nearly as boring as that sounds.

Lower your expectations: This is not a sequel to Portal. Now get ready to raise them slightly, because it is in the expanded universe of those games. Desk Job puts you squarely in the driver’s seat at Aperture Science. Then quickly removes the driving part and adds a desk in front of the seat.

name: Shadow Burglar
description: In Shadow Burglar, you will be playing as Jean, a thief with the mystical power of morphing with the shadows. Creating yourself an improbable path in the dark and carefully dealing with guards in the light, you will try to steal back your deceased brother’s paintings, who were stolen by a secret criminal organization. Do you have what it takes to avenge his legacy?

name: Squarena
description: Squarena is a skill-based party game with an emphasis on physics combat. The game mechanics support ease of entry with a high skill ceiling. Have you ever wanted to prove to your friends who the best colorfully decorated square combatant is? If so, this is the game for you!

name: Maze Twister
description: Rotate the maze to make the ball reach the destination.

name: Music Thief
description: Music Thief is a top-down shooter where you need to destroy all the benchmarks on the spot. Your house is your fortress, clear it of thieves. Each one threatens your image as a musician. The traps in the next house have already worked, they can hurt you, dodge and shoot all the benchmarks.

name: Swordbattle.io
description: Swordbattle.io is a PVP multiplayer game with 2D swords, where you try to gain coins. The more coins you have, the more bigger and powerful you get! Try to become the biggest of them all.

name: Banish
description: BANISH is a Single and Co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. As a Priest, you are sent by the local church to a failed exorcism attempt in the Luxford Mansion. Fear, Panic, and Horror awaits you...

name: Papertris
description: Papertris is a fast and exciting arcade puzzle game that combines classic gameplay with fresh new features

name: Rabbit Meadow
description: Play as a rabbit and explore a beautiful meadow. Customize your rabbit's appearance, dig for toys, and interact with other animals. A lighthearted game for bunny lovers to run around and relax with nature. If you love rabbits, then this is the game for you!

name: Capelord: Bounty Hunters
description: Capelord:Bounty Hunter is a multiplayer lateral action shooter for up to 4 players, play campaign missions alone or as a team, compete against other players for loot by defeating the area boss.

name: Pants Quest
description: Pants Quest is a tiny, lovingly crafted point & click adventure game about finding your way in life. And your pants. Sometimes just getting dressed & leaving the house feels like an impossible task. Follow one man's emotional journey to deal with the hurdles that life can throw at you on a bad day.

name: Bomb Club: Deluxe
description: If you have a knack for explosives, the Bomb Club welcomes you! Meet new bombs, uncover new challenges, and create awesome chain reactions in this explosive puzzle game!

name: Risk of Rain 2: Survivors of the Void
description: Embrace The Void as it overtakes Petrichor V in the multiplayer roguelike Risk of Rain 2's first-ever expansion, Survivors of the Void! New survivors, monsters, stages, and a new class of items have arrived to help you kick the crabs back to their dimension.

name: Ring of Titans
description: Ring of Titans is a modern take on the small scale fast paced team combat arena genre. Queue up to play 1v1, 2v2, or 3v3, the first team to eliminate everyone from the other team wins. No grinding, no pay to win, just queue and play.

name: Get Achievements for Achievements
description: The main goal of this game is to get achievements.

name: Cliff & Field
